Phrase en Anglais: Atmacite is best described as the crystalline agglomeration of a creature's soul.

Phrase en Français: Our scientists have succeeded in discovering a way to tap its power to serve the efforts of the Voidwatch.${prompt}

Phrase en Anglais: At first glance, atmacite appears to be the perfect artificial enhancement. However, it does suffer from a single limitation: its power is unleashed only when engaged in a Voidwatch operation.${prompt}
